trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism for programmatically building the constraints for a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 提供机制以便以编程方式为语音识别语法生成约束。

trans-unit.source: Speech recognition grammars are commonly authored in the XML format defined by the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: 在使用定义的 XML 格式通常创作语音识别语法[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with SRGS but want to generate the grammars programmatically, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> namespace, whose members correspond closely to the elements and attributes defined by SRGS.
trans-unit.target: 如果你熟悉 SRGS 但想要以编程方式生成语法，你可以使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar>命名空间，其成员的元素和特性定义 SRGS 密切对应。

trans-unit.source: If you are unfamiliar with SRGS, or you want a lightweight, programmatic approach to authoring grammars with which you can efficiently accomplish many common scenarios; you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不熟悉 SRGS，或者你想创作的语法与你可以有效地的轻量、 编程方法来完成许多常见方案;你可以使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>类。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects to build a hierarchical tree composed of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objects that contain alternate phrases, interspersed with preamble and post-amble phrases at each node, and seeded with semantic values that convey meaning back to the application.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象生成一个层次结构树组成<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象，其中包含与前导码和在每个节点的后 amble 短语交织在一起并使用传递的含义的语义值设定种子的备用短语回流到应用程序。

trans-unit.source: To use a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> to create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object, use the following steps.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象，请使用以下步骤。

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Append constraints to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>, such as <xref:System.String> objects, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DictationGrammar>, and other <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that define the constraints for the grammar.
trans-unit.target: 追加到约束<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>，如<xref:System.String>对象， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DictationGrammar>，和其他<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>定义的语法的约束的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructors to create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from the completed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> grammar.
trans-unit.target: 使用之一<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>构造函数来创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象从已完成<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>语法。

trans-unit.source: Authoring with <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> is best suited to grammars that have a single rule containing lists, or perhaps lists of lists.
trans-unit.target: 使用创作<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>最适合于具有包含列表或可能是列表的列表，一项规则的语法。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically build grammars that have multiple rules, or that need to make internal rule references, use the classes of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式生成具有多个规则，或者需要以使的内部规则引用的语法，使用的类<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> can also be obtained by implicit conversions from certain other classes or by combining a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> with a second object that contains constraints for a grammar..
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>也可以通过从某些其他类隐式转换或通过组合获取<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>与第二个对象包含的语法约束...

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A> operators and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A>运算符和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add rules to an existing <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendDictation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendWildcard%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要将规则添加到现有<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendDictation%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendWildcard%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element.
trans-unit.target: 使用包含具有相同的密钥名称重复语义元素或多个可以反复修改相同的语义元素的值的语义元素语音识别语法时，语音识别器可以引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成包含语义信息语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。

trans-unit.source: To help with debugging, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.DebugShowPhrases%2A> property returns the current status of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> as a string.
trans-unit.target: 若要帮助进行调试，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.DebugShowPhrases%2A>属性返回的当前状态<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>作为字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[语音识别](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)和[创建 GrammarBuilder 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objects to construct a grammar that can recognize either of the two phrases, "Make background *colorChoice*" or "Set background to *colorChoice*".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象来构造能够识别的两个短语，任一语法"使背景*colorChoice*"或"设置为背景*colorChoice*".

trans-unit.source: The example uses a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object to create a list of acceptable values for *colorChoice* from an array of <xref:System.String> objects.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>要创建的可接受的值的列表对象*colorChoice*从数组<xref:System.String>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object is analogous to the `one-of` element in the SRGS specification, and contains a set of alternate phrases, any of which can be recognized when spoken.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象是类似于`one-of`SRGS 规范中的元素和包含一组备用短语，其中的任何读出时可以被识别。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object to group an array of two <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects into a pair of alternative phrases that the resultant grammar can recognize.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象进行分组的两个数组<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>分为的替代结果语法可以识别的短语对的对象。

trans-unit.source: Alternate words or phrases are a component of most grammars, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object provides this functionality for grammars constructed with <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 备用的词或短语是大多数语法的组成部分和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象提供此功能使用的语法构造<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: The example finally creates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> constructed from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该示例创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>从构造<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class can also be obtained by implicit conversions from other classes or by combining a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object with a second object to from a new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 通过从其他类的隐式转换或通过组合，也可以获取此类的实例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象是否与从新到第二个对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add constraints to an existing <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendDictation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendWildcard%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: 若要将约束添加到现有<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendDictation%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendWildcard%2A>方法，与<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A>运算符。

trans-unit.target: 使用包含具有相同的密钥名称重复语义元素或多个可以反复修改相同的语义元素的值的语义元素语音识别语法时，语音识别器可以引发异常。

trans-unit.target: 若要将规则添加到现有<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendDictation%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendWildcard%2A>方法，与<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A>运算符。

trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>要创建的可接受的值的列表对象*colorChoice*从数组<xref:System.String>对象。

trans-unit.target: 语义键。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> class from a semantic key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化语义钥中的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> object, you add semantic information to the grammar that can be returned in the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>实例从<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>对象，将语义信息添加到可以识别结果中返回的语法。

trans-unit.source: You can access the semantic information in the recognition result using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>, which is available in the handler for the `SpeechRecognized` event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问在识别结果中使用的语义信息<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>，这是可用的处理程序中`SpeechRecognized`事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> defines a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, this can be used to retrieve the semantic information in a recognition result that is associated with the key.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>定义<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>，这可以用于检索与键关联的识别结果中的语义信息。

trans-unit.source: See the example for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>, and also see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅示例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>，并还会看到<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>。

trans-unit.source: When you construct <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> object.
trans-unit.target: 构造时<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>包含的对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>实例，请确保你避免使用同一密钥名称或多个可以反复修改的语义元素创建重复的语义元素<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>对象。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer can throw an exception if it encounters these circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到这些情况下，在语音识别器可以引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成包含语义信息语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar that can recognize the two phrases, "Make background *colorChoice*" and "Set background to *colorChoice*", where *colorChoice* is selected from a set of colors.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建可以识别的两个短语语音识别语法"使背景*colorChoice*"和"设置为背景*colorChoice*"，其中*colorChoice*从一组颜色选择。

trans-unit.source: The grammar lets a user speak any of several color names, and returns semantic information about the recognized color name to the application.
trans-unit.target: 语法允许朗读的多个颜色名称，任何用户，并识别的颜色名称的语义信息返回到应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a single <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> with which you can retrieve the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> that is associated with the color spoken by the user.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用单个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>与可以检索<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>这是由用户说出的颜色关联。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the input contains the phrase, "Set background to red", the recognition result contains the semantic value of "#FF0000", which you can retrieve using a handler for the `SpeechRecognized` event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果输入包含这个短语:"为红色的一组后台"识别结果包含"#FF0000"，后者可以检索使用的处理程序的语义值`SpeechRecognized`事件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects to build the constraints that are all contained in the last <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object, `bothPhrases`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.String>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象以生成所有中最后一个包含约束<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象， `bothPhrases`。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example constructs a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from the completed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该示例构造<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象从已完成<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: The semantic value or name/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 语义值或名称/值对。

trans-unit.target: 初始化语义值中的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar that can recognize the two phrases, "Make background *colorChoice*" and "Set background to *colorChoice*", where *colorChoice* is selected from a set of colors.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建可以识别的两个短语语音识别语法"使背景*colorChoice*"和"设置为背景*colorChoice*"，其中*colorChoice*从一组颜色选择。

trans-unit.source: The grammar lets a user speak any of several color names, and returns semantic information about the recognized color name to the application.
trans-unit.target: 语法允许朗读的多个颜色名称，任何用户，并识别的颜色名称的语义信息返回到应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a single <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> with which you can retrieve the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> that is associated with the color spoken by the user.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用单个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>与可以检索<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>这是由用户说出的颜色关联。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the input contains the phrase, "Set background to red", the recognition result contains the semantic value of "#FF0000", which you can retrieve using a handler for the `SpeechRecognized` event.

trans-unit.source: The sequence of words.
trans-unit.target: 字符序列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> class from a sequence of words.
trans-unit.target: 从字序列中初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The phrase represents an exact spoken phrase that the speech recognition grammar can recognize.
trans-unit.target: 短语表示语音识别语法可以识别的精确的口头的短语。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains strings, see [Using Strings to Create a GrammarBuilder Grammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d87b445-a342-4369-9b3f-91d07fd7e114).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成包含字符串语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用字符串创建 GrammarBuilder 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d87b445-a342-4369-9b3f-91d07fd7e114)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objects to construct a grammar that can recognize either of the two phrases, "Make background *colorChoice*" or "Set background to *colorChoice*".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象来构造能够识别的两个短语，任一语法"使背景*colorChoice*"或"设置为背景*colorChoice*".

trans-unit.source: After creating a list of acceptable values for *colorChoice* using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object, the example initializes two <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects, `makePhrase` and `setPhrase`, using a string as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 创建可接受的值的列表之后*colorChoice*使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象，该示例初始化两个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象，`makePhrase`和`setPhrase`，使用字符串作为自变量。

trans-unit.source: The example finally creates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object cast to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该示例创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象强制转换为<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象。

trans-unit.source: The sequence of words.
trans-unit.target: 字符序列。

trans-unit.source: The matching mode the speech recognition grammar uses to recognize the phrase.
trans-unit.target: 用于识别短语的语法识别语法的匹配模式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> class for a subset of a sequence of words.
trans-unit.target: 根据字序列的子集初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The `phrase` parameter represents the phrase that the speech recognition grammar can recognize.
trans-unit.target: `phrase`参数表示语音识别语法可以识别的短语。

trans-unit.source: The `subsetMatchingMode` parameter specifies a subset of the phrase that can be spoken to achieve successful recognition of the entire phrase.
trans-unit.target: `subsetMatchingMode`参数指定要朗读若要实现的整个短语成功识别的短语的子集。

trans-unit.source: You can use this to create a grammar with a list of entries that have long names, without requiring users to speak an entire name to match an item.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此语法创建与具有较长的名称，而无需用户说出整个名称，以匹配项的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the matching modes, see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 有关匹配的模式的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains strings, see [Using Strings to Create a GrammarBuilder Grammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d87b445-a342-4369-9b3f-91d07fd7e114).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成包含字符串语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用字符串创建 GrammarBuilder 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d87b445-a342-4369-9b3f-91d07fd7e114)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode> value and a grammar for choosing between the matching mode grammars.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建每个语音识别语法<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode>值和匹配的模式语法之间进行选择的语法。

trans-unit.source: If the value of `phrase` is "one two three four five six seven", then the Subsequence grammar recognizes the input "two three four", but not the input "one three five".
trans-unit.target: 如果值`phrase`是"一个两个三个四个五个六个七个"，然后子序列语法识别输入"两个三个四个"，但不是输入"一个三个五个"。

trans-unit.source: However, the Ordered Subset grammar recognizes both of these inputs.
trans-unit.target: 但是，排序子集语法认识到这两个这些输入。

trans-unit.source: The repeated element.
trans-unit.target: 被重复元素。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that input matching the element defined by <c>builder</c> must occur to constitute a match.
trans-unit.target: 必须发生输入匹配 <c>builder</c> 定义的元素的最小次数才能构成匹配。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that input matching the element defined by <c>builder</c> can occur to constitute a match.
trans-unit.target: 可能发生输入匹配 <c>builder</c> 定义的元素的最大次数以构成匹配。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> class from a repeated element.
trans-unit.target: 从重复元素中初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If the value of `minRepeat` is 0, then the new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> represents an optional element.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`minRepeat`为 0，则新<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>表示可选元素。

trans-unit.source: The value of `minRepeat` must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to the value of `maxRepeat`.
trans-unit.target: 值`minRepeat`必须大于或等于 0 且小于或等于的值`maxRepeat`。

trans-unit.source: When you specify repeats for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> object.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的重复<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>包含的对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>实例，请确保你避免使用同一密钥名称或多个可以反复修改的语义元素创建重复的语义元素<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>对象。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer can throw an exception if it encounters these circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到这些情况下，在语音识别器可以引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成包含语义信息语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for ordering a pizza.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建排序顺序，比萨语音识别的语法。

trans-unit.source: It starts with an optional, opening phrase, followed by one to four toppings, and closes with the word "pizza".
trans-unit.target: 它开头后跟一至四个浇头的可选，打开短语并关闭 word"比萨"。

trans-unit.source: The repeated sequence of words.
trans-unit.target: 重复的字符序列。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of times that input matching the phrase must occur to constitute a match.
trans-unit.target: 必须发生构成匹配的输入匹配的短语的最小次数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that input matching the phrase can occur to constitute a match.
trans-unit.target: 可能发生构成匹配的输入匹配的短语的最大次数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> class from the sequence of words in a <see cref="T:System.String" /> and specifies how many times the <see cref="T:System.String" /> can be repeated.
trans-unit.target: 初始化来自 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 中的单词的序列的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 类的新实例并指定 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 可以重复使用的次数。

trans-unit.source: If the value of `minRepeat` is 0, then the new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> represents an optional element.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`minRepeat`为 0，则新<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>表示可选元素。

trans-unit.source: The value of `minRepeat` must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to the value of `maxRepeat`.
trans-unit.target: 值`minRepeat`必须大于或等于 0 且小于或等于的值`maxRepeat`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains strings, see [Using Strings to Create a GrammarBuilder Grammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d87b445-a342-4369-9b3f-91d07fd7e114).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成包含字符串语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用字符串创建 GrammarBuilder 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d87b445-a342-4369-9b3f-91d07fd7e114)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for ordering a pizza.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建排序顺序，比萨语音识别的语法。

trans-unit.source: It starts with an optional, opening phrase, followed by one to four toppings, and closes with the word "pizza".
trans-unit.target: 它开头后跟一至四个浇头的可选，打开短语并关闭 word"比萨"。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> that contains a sequence of two grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: 创建包含两个语法元素序列的新 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A> methods provide another mechanism by which you can combine various types to create diversity and flexibility in grammars built with <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 静态<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>方法提供了另一种机制，依据你可以组合各种类型创建多样性和使用生成的语法中的灵活性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: These methods correspond to the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A> methods, which are also defined on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法对应于静态<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A>方法，还定义了<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>类。

trans-unit.source: The order of the parameters determines the order of the elements in the new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 参数的顺序确定在新的元素的顺序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> can also be obtained from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, and [String](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159733) objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>也可以从获取<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>，和[字符串](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159733)对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A> operators.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A>运算符。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element.
trans-unit.target: 使用包含具有相同的密钥名称重复语义元素或多个可以反复修改相同的语义元素的值的语义元素语音识别语法时，语音识别器可以引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成包含语义信息语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[语音识别](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)和[创建 GrammarBuilder 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)。

trans-unit.source: When you combine <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> object.
trans-unit.target: 在合并<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>包含的对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>实例，请确保你避免使用同一密钥名称或多个可以反复修改的语义元素创建重复的语义元素<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>对象。

trans-unit.source: Appends a grammar element to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加语法元素。

trans-unit.source: Use these methods to append grammar elements to an existing <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些方法来将语法元素附加到现有<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: As you create grammar elements, you can append them to the existing builder to progressively develop the constraints for a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 在创建语法元素时，你可以将它们追加到现有的生成器渐进式开发语音识别语法的约束。

trans-unit.source: Each element is added to the end of the current sequence of elements.

trans-unit.source: For example, the generated grammar `OrderedSubset` recognizes the phrases, "three four five" and "one three five", and the grammar `Subsequence` recognizes the phrase "three four five", but not the phrase, "one three five".

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar that incorporates the spelling dictation grammar rules.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建合并的拼写听写语法规则语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: Appends a grammar file or a grammar rule to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加语法文件或语法规则。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A> methods can append a grammar file or a grammar rule from a file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>方法可以追加语法文件或从文件的语法规则。

trans-unit.source: These methods allow applications to make use of pre-deployed or publicly available grammar rules.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法允许应用程序以利用预部署或公开提供的语法规则。

trans-unit.source: The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须具有读取访问权限指定的语法文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: These methods can read a speech recognition grammar from the following formats.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法可从以下格式读取语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)
trans-unit.target: 符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)

trans-unit.source: Binary files that conform to the Microsoft Speech Recognition Grammar Binary Format (.cfg file extension)
trans-unit.target: 符合 Microsoft 语音识别语法二进制格式 （.cfg 文件扩展名） 的二进制文件

trans-unit.source: Compiling an XML-format SRGS grammar file to a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension can reduce the time consumed by searches for a match, especially if the grammar requires recognition of a large number of words and phrases.
trans-unit.target: 编译 XML 格式 SRGS.cfg 扩展名的二进制语法文件的语法文件可减少搜索匹配项，使用的时间尤其是在语法需要大量的单词和短语的识别。

trans-unit.source: For information about compiling SRGS grammars to the CFG binary format, see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>.
trans-unit.target: 有关编译为 CFG 的二进制格式的 SRGS 语法的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>。

trans-unit.source: The path or Universal Resource Identifier (URI) of the file that describes a speech recognition grammar in a supported format.
trans-unit.target: 在一个支持的布局描述语音识别语法的路径通用资源标识符（URI）的文件。

trans-unit.source: Appends a grammar definition file to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加语法定义文件。

trans-unit.source: The URI provided by the `path` argument may be local or remote.
trans-unit.target: 通过提供的 URI`path`参数可能为本地或远程。

trans-unit.source: The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须具有读取访问权限指定的语法文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: A W3C Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) representation can define a root rule.
trans-unit.target: W3C 语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 表示可以定义根规则。

trans-unit.source: This method appends the grammar, beginning with its root rule, to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将追加的语法，其根规则，语法元素的当前序列开头。

trans-unit.source: To append a specific grammar rule, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将追加指定的语法规则，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following C# example creates a speech recognition grammar that uses the rule named `Cities` in a local SRGS file, cities.grxml.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 示例创建使用名为的规则语音识别语法`Cities`在本地 SRGS 文件中，cities.grxml。

trans-unit.source: The content of the cities.grxml file appears below the C# code example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 代码示例显示 cities.grxml 文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: The file path or Universal Resource Identifier (URI) of the file that describes a speech recognition grammar in a supported format.
trans-unit.target: 在一个支持的布局描述语音识别语法的路径通用资源标识符（URI）的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to append, or <see langword="null" /> to append the default root rule of the grammar file.
trans-unit.target: 规则的追加、或追加语法文件的默认根规则的标识符 <see langword="null" /> 。

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified rule of a grammar definition file to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加指定的语法定义文件规则。

trans-unit.source: The URI provided by the `path` argument may be local or remote.
trans-unit.target: 通过提供的 URI`path`参数可能为本地或远程。

trans-unit.source: The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须具有读取访问权限指定的语法文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use the use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A> method to append a grammar file beginning with its root rule.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>方法要追加其根规则开头的语法文件。

trans-unit.source: The following C# example creates a speech recognition grammar that uses the rule named `Cities` in a local SRGS file, cities.grxml.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 示例创建使用名为的规则语音识别语法`Cities`在本地 SRGS 文件中，cities.grxml。

trans-unit.source: The content of the cities.grxml file appears below the C# code example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 代码示例显示 cities.grxml 文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: Appends a recognition grammar element that matches any input to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加与任何输入匹配的识别语法元素。

trans-unit.source: The wildcard element is added to the end of the current sequence of elements.
trans-unit.target: 通配符元素添加到元素的当前序列的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The wildcard element matches any spoken word.
trans-unit.target: 通配符元素都与匹配任何说出的词语。

trans-unit.source: It does not match background noise or silence.
trans-unit.target: 它不匹配背景噪音或静默。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that accepts password input as a wildcard.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建接受密码输入作为通配符语法。

trans-unit.source: The example attaches a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler to the grammar that validates the password input.
trans-unit.target: 该示例将附加<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>语法，用于验证的密码输入的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture of the speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置语音识别语法的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The culture of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The default is the executing thread's <see cref="P:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 区域性是执行线程的<see cref="P:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture" />属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructor creates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that can be used by a speech recognizer of the corresponding culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>构造函数创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>可由语音识别器的相应的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Culture%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> that is provided as the parameter to the Grammar constructor is used to set the culture of the resulting speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 仅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Culture%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>提供如语法构造函数的参数用于设置生成的语音识别语法的区域性。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码。

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the `Culture` property, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行使用中指定的语言的语音识别`Culture`属性、 语音识别引擎支持，必须安装语言-国家/地区代码。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: 随 Microsoft Windows 7 的语音识别引擎使用以下语言-国家/地区代码。

trans-unit.source: en-GB.
trans-unit.target: en GB。

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom)
trans-unit.target: 英语 （英国）

trans-unit.source: en-US.
trans-unit.target: EN-US。

trans-unit.source: English (United States)
trans-unit.target: 英语 （美国）

trans-unit.source: de-DE.
German (Germany)
trans-unit.target: 德语 （德国）

trans-unit.source: es-ES.
trans-unit.target: es-ES.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain)
trans-unit.target: 西班牙语 （西班牙）

trans-unit.source: fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: fr 法属

trans-unit.source: French (France)
trans-unit.target: 法语 （法国）

trans-unit.source: ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: 日本 JP。

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan)
trans-unit.target: 日语 （日本）

trans-unit.source: zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: 中文-CN。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China)
trans-unit.target: 中文 （中国）

trans-unit.source: zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: 中文-TW。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan)
trans-unit.target: 中文 （台湾）

trans-unit.source: Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: 两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"，"fr"或者"es"还允许使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for ordering a pizza with up to four toppings.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建排序顺序，使用最多四个浇头比萨语音识别的语法。

trans-unit.source: It specifically sets the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object's culture to English (United States).
trans-unit.target: 它专门设置<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象的区域性为英语 （美国）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that shows the contents and structure of the grammar contained by the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，此字符串显示 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 包含的语法的内容和结构。

trans-unit.source: The current content and structure of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前内容和结构 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 的。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for ordering a pizza with up to four toppings.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建排序顺序，使用最多四个浇头比萨语音识别的语法。

trans-unit.source: It writes the status of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> to the console before creating the grammar.
trans-unit.target: 它将写入的状态<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>到之前创建语法控制台。

trans-unit.source: This method generates the following output:
trans-unit.target: 此方法会生成以下输出：

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> that corresponds to a sequence of two grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: 创建对应于两个语法元素序列的新 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: The order of the operands determines the order of the elements in the new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 操作数的顺序确定在新的元素的顺序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: Caution is recommended when combining <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances with other grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: 组合时，建议注意<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>包含的对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>与其他语法元素的实例。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element.
trans-unit.target: 使用包含具有相同的密钥名称重复语义元素或多个可以反复修改相同的语义元素的值的语义元素语音识别语法时，语音识别器可以引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成包含语义信息语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[语音识别](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)和[创建 GrammarBuilder 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)。

trans-unit.source: The first grammar element, which represents a set of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: 第一个语法元素，表示一组替代项。

trans-unit.source: The second grammar element.
trans-unit.target: 第二个语法元素。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> that contains a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices" /> object followed by a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" />，其中包含一个 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices" /> 对象以及跟随在此对象后面的一个 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> for the sequence of the <paramref name="choices" /> parameter followed by the <paramref name="builder" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <paramref name="choices" /> 参数后面的 <paramref name="builder" /> 参数序列的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> supports conversions from the following classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> 支持从以下类的转换。

trans-unit.source: This method accepts the objects listed above for the `builder` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法接受上面所列对象`builder`参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A> operators.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>运算符。

trans-unit.source: When you combine <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> object.
trans-unit.target: 在合并<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>包含的对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>实例，请确保你避免使用同一密钥名称或多个可以反复修改的语义元素创建重复的语义元素<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>对象。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer can throw an exception if it encounters these circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到这些情况下，在语音识别器可以引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Understanding SemanticResultValue and SemanticResultKey Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成包含语义信息语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[了解 SemanticResultValue 和 SemanticResultKey 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%28System.Speech.Recognition.Choices%2CSystem.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%28System.Speech.Recognition.Choices%2CSystem.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first grammar element.
trans-unit.target: 第一个语法元素。

trans-unit.source: The second grammar element, which represents a set of alternative elements.
trans-unit.target: 第二个表示重置系列的替换元素。

trans-unit.target: 创建包含后跟一个 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> 的新 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> for the sequence of the <paramref name="builder" /> parameter followed by the <paramref name="choices" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <paramref name="builder" /> 参数后面的 <paramref name="choices" /> 参数序列的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> supports conversions from the following classes:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> 支持从以下类的转换：

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>运算符。

trans-unit.source: When you combine <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> object.
trans-unit.target: 在合并<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>包含的对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>实例，请确保你避免使用同一密钥名称或多个可以反复修改的语义元素创建重复的语义元素<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>对象。

trans-unit.target: 如果遇到这些情况下，在语音识别器可以引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Understanding SemanticResultValue and SemanticResultKey Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).
trans-unit.target: 有关生成包含语义信息语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[了解 SemanticResultValue 和 SemanticResultKey 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%28System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder%2CSystem.Speech.Recognition.Choices%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar that can recognize the two phrases, "Make background *color*" and "Set background to *color*", where *color* is selected from a set of colors.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建可以识别的两个短语语音识别语法"使背景*颜色*"和"设置为背景*颜色*"，其中*颜色*从一组颜色选择。

trans-unit.source: Various types are used to build the final grammar, such as [String](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159733), <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects.
trans-unit.target: 各种类型用于生成最终的语法，如[字符串](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159733)， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象。

trans-unit.source: When you combine <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> object.
trans-unit.target: 在合并<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>包含的对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>实例，请确保你避免使用同一密钥名称或多个可以反复修改的语义元素创建重复的语义元素<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>对象。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer can throw an exception if it encounters these circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到这些情况下，在语音识别器可以引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objects to construct a grammar that can recognize either of the two phrases, "Make background *colorChoice*" or "Set background to *colorChoice*".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象来构造能够识别的两个短语，任一语法"使背景*colorChoice*"或"设置为背景*colorChoice*".

trans-unit.source: After creating a list of acceptable values for *colorChoice* using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object, the example initializes two <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects, `makePhrase` and `setPhrase`, using implicit conversion from string objects.
trans-unit.target: 创建可接受的值的列表之后*colorChoice*使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象，该示例初始化两个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象，`makePhrase`和`setPhrase`，使用从字符串的隐式转换对象。

trans-unit.source: The example finally creates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object cast to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该示例创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>对象强制转换为<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象。
